customer_issue: I was charged twice for my subscription.
resolution_response: We apologize for the inconvenience. We have refunded the duplicate charge.

customer_issue: Why is my bill higher than expected?
resolution_response: Your bill may include additional fees or a price increase. Please check the breakdown in your account.

customer_issue: I want to update my payment method.
resolution_response: You can update your payment details in the billing section of your account settings.

customer_issue: My app keeps crashing on startup.
resolution_response: Try clearing the app cache or reinstalling the app. Let us know if the issue persists.

customer_issue: The website is not loading properly.
resolution_response: Please try clearing your browser cache or using a different browser.

customer_issue: My camera is not working on video calls.
resolution_response: Ensure that the app has camera permissions enabled in your device settings.

customer_issue: I forgot my password and can't reset it.
resolution_response: You can reset your password using the 'Forgot Password' link. If you need further assistance, contact support.

customer_issue: My account was locked after multiple login attempts.
resolution_response: For security reasons, your account is temporarily locked. Please try again in 30 minutes or reset your password.

customer_issue: Can I change my email address?
resolution_response: Yes, you can update your email in the account settings. A verification email will be sent.

customer_issue: Does this product come with a warranty?
resolution_response: Yes, this product includes a 1-year manufacturer's warranty.

customer_issue: What are the dimensions of this item?
resolution_response: The product dimensions are listed in the specifications section on the product page.

customer_issue: Is this item available in other colors?
resolution_response: Yes, this product is available in multiple colors. Please check the available options on the website.

customer_issue: I want to request a refund for my order.
resolution_response: You can request a refund through your order history. Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days.

customer_issue: Why was my refund denied?
resolution_response: Refunds may be denied if the return policy criteria are not met. Please review our return policy.

customer_issue: Can I get a refund if I used a promo code?
resolution_response: Refunds are issued for the amount paid after applying the promo code.

customer_issue: My order is delayed. When will it arrive?
resolution_response: We apologize for the delay. You can check the latest tracking updates in your order history.

customer_issue: Why is my package stuck in transit?
resolution_response: Shipping delays may occur due to carrier issues. Please allow additional time for delivery.

customer_issue: Can I expedite my shipping?
resolution_response: If your order has not yet shipped, you may upgrade to express shipping in your order settings.

customer_issue: How do I cancel my subscription?
resolution_response: You can cancel your subscription in your account settings under the 'Subscription' section.

customer_issue: Will I be charged if I cancel before the renewal date?
resolution_response: No, if you cancel before your next billing cycle, you will not be charged.

customer_issue: Can I pause my subscription instead of canceling?
resolution_response: Yes, we offer a pause option for up to 3 months.

customer_issue: Where is my package?
resolution_response: You can track your package using the tracking number provided in your order confirmation.

customer_issue: My tracking number is not updating.
resolution_response: Tracking updates may take up to 24 hours. If there's no update after that, contact the carrier.

customer_issue: Can I change my delivery address after placing the order?
resolution_response: Once an order is processed, the delivery address cannot be changed. Please contact support for options.
